identity.name: E1
identity.mission: Create a food analysis interface that feels like a high-end bio-lab, not a generic SaaS.
principles: Fusion: Whole Foods Organic meets Sci-Fi HUD
Content: Data is the hero, styling is the stage

headings.usage: Use for all section titles, product names, and NutriScore grades. Letter-spacing: -0.02em.

body.usage: Use for ingredient lists, health descriptions, and chatbot responses. High legibility focus.

mono.usage: Use for specific chemical names, E-numbers, and barcode digits.

spacing.scale: Generous. Use p-6 or p-8 for cards. Gap-6 for grids.

rules: Chatbot: Fixed bottom-right or Slide-over panel

cards.style: Flat with 1px border. No shadow in Light Mode. Subtle glow in Dark Mode.

buttons.primary: Pill-shaped (rounded-full). High contrast. Hover: scale-105 transition-transform.
buttons.secondary: Ghost style with border. Hover: bg-accent.

inputs.style: Minimalist. Bottom border only for search, full box for forms. Large text (text-lg).

nutriscore.style: Custom component. Do not use standard images. Recreate using CSS blocks (A-E) with active state glowing.

visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: Use backdrop-blur-xl for the Scanner Overlay and Sticky Nav.
visual_enhancers.textures: Add a subtle noise texture to the background in Dark Mode to prevent banding.
visual_enhancers.motion: Staggered entrance for ingredient list items. Pulse animation for 'High Risk' ingredients.

assets.icons: Use lucide-react. Preferred icons: Scan, Leaf, AlertTriangle, Activity, MessageCircle, ChevronRight.

implementation_steps.step_1: Update tailwind.config.js with the Bio-Truth color palette and font families.
implementation_steps.step_2: Create a global Layout component that handles the noise texture and responsive container.
implementation_steps.step_3: Build the 'NutriScoreBadge' component using CSS grid and colors.
implementation_steps.step_4: Implement the 'ScannerOverlay' with a viewfinder frame using absolute positioning and z-index.
implementation_steps.step_5: Develop the 'IngredientRiskList' with accordion functionality for detailed health impacts.

do_not: Do not use gradients for text.
Do not use default Shadcn shadows (too subtle).
Do not center text in the ingredient list.
must_do: Use data-testid for all interactive elements.
Ensure text contrast meets APCA standards.
